channel.title: Carnt Connect to localhost or other ip{Still Not solved}
channel.description: Hi everyone so i just got a new computer so i go to client.java changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 But it wont Connect or to Eney other ips eney Idea on how to fix this i also tryed it on my old 317 sever and it is doing the same

item.title: Carnt Connect to localhost or other ip{Still Not solved}
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“TheTutMan, post:3, topic:477169”]and the compile path is ok i think

This is the compile code

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause

and if i give u my client would u look ill post a pic that there is no virus to[/quote]
Didn’t it say something about an anti-leech in the [size=24pt][shadow=red,left]Exilium[/shadow][/size] Release topic?

item.title: Carnt Connect to localhost or other ip{Still Not solved}
item.dc:creator: @dfsg dfsg
item.description:
@dfsg wrote:

check ur ip is up on no-ip.com make sure u put the correct id address ipv4 = (cmd) u can find here download the ip checker from no-ip.com and make sure to check mark your server dont misspell your server make sure caps and all are the same… ALSO CHECK TO SEE IF UR JAVA MATCHES THE ONE IN COMPILER AND RUN.BAT -----> edit run and compile look to see that your (path is the same)

Read full topic
